list.name: RECOILING-ROTATOR
list.description: Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals x damage and recharges his Super by x% if it hits enemies!
list.descriptionHtml: Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals x damage and recharges his Super by x% if it hits enemies!

list.name: TAR-BARREL
list.description: Darryl creates a slowing area around himself for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Darryl creates a slowing area around himself for x seconds.
